text: Janice Danoff Schakowsky (born May 26, 1944) is an American politician. She is the U.S. Representative for since 1999. She is a member of the Democratic Party. In April 2025, Schakowsky announced she would not run for re-election in 2026. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Jan Schakowsky official U.S. House website * Jan Schakowsky for Congress * * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jan Schakowsky
